title: US Family Seeks Compensation From NASA After Space Junk Destroys Home
content: A US family whose home was hit by space debris earlier this year is seeking compensation from the American space agency NASA for property damage and mental anguish.
summary: A US family whose home was hit by space debris earlier this year is seeking compensation from the American space agency NASA for property damage and mental anguish.

title: New Jersey Gamer Flies To Florida To Attack Online Rival With Hammer
content: Edward Kang faces serious charges, including attempted second-degree murder and armed burglary with a mask.

title: Videos Show Raging Water Flowing Around US Dam As It Sweeps Away Building
content: Videos showed a tremendous volume of water flowing around the dam, swallowing a building as dead trees and other debris piled up around it.
summary: Videos showed a tremendous volume of water flowing around the dam, swallowing a building as dead trees and other debris piled up around it.

title: Abraham Lincoln's Wax Sculpture In US Melts As Temperatures Soar
content: A six-foot-tall wax statue of former US President Abraham Lincoln in Washington melted as the capital city's temperatures soared over the weekend.
summary: A six-foot-tall wax statue of former US President Abraham Lincoln in Washington melted as the capital city's temperatures soared over the weekend.

title: US Couple Kept Adopted Black Children As "Slaves", Locked Them In Shed
content: The indictment alleges that the children were forced to work on the couple's farmland because of their race and treated as slaves.
summary: The indictment alleges that the children were forced to work on the couple's farmland because of their race and treated as slaves.

title: Karachi On High Alert Over Mysterious Deaths, 22 Found Dead Across City
content: The city of Karachi is grappling with a mysterious and concerning trend as the number of unidentified bodies found in various areas of the metropolis has now reached 22, according to a Geo News report on Wednesday.
summary: The city of Karachi is grappling with a mysterious and concerning trend as the number of unidentified bodies found in various areas of the metropolis has now reached 22, according to a Geo News report on Wednesday.

title: Opinion: The Great Asian Reconciliation: Can India-China Find Common Ground?
content: It might sound crazy to suggest that India and China should become trusted partners like the US and India, or Russia and China. But, it's not entirely out of the question.
summary: It might sound crazy to suggest that India and China should become trusted partners like the US and India, or Russia and China. But, it's not entirely out of the question.

title: How Tech Firm Employee Planned And Executed Murder Of His Ex-Boss In US
content: Tyrese Haspil's scheme to steal from his former boss, Fahim Saleh, began in 2018, but it wasn't until July 2020 that his plan turned deadly.
summary: Tyrese Haspil's scheme to steal from his former boss, Fahim Saleh, began in 2018, but it wasn't until July 2020 that his plan turned deadly.

title: Woman Who Killed 3 Daughters Jailed For 18 Years In New Zealand
content: A New Zealand judge on Wednesday sentenced a woman to 18 years imprisonment for murdering her three young daughters in 2021.
summary: A New Zealand judge on Wednesday sentenced a woman to 18 years imprisonment for murdering her three young daughters in 2021.

title: South Korean Airport Briefly Shuts Due To N Korea's Trash Balloons
content: Takeoffs and landings at South Korea's Incheon International Airport were disrupted on Wednesday for about three hours before dawn because of balloons launched by North Korea filled with refuse, an airport spokesperson said.
summary: Takeoffs and landings at South Korea's Incheon International Airport were disrupted on Wednesday for about three hours before dawn because of balloons launched by North Korea filled with refuse, an airport spokesperson said.

title: US Woman, 18, Arrested For Calling 911 To Avoid Meeting Man She Met Online
content: An 18-year-old woman in the United States has been arrested for calling 911 to avoid going on a date with a man she met on a dating app.
summary: An 18-year-old woman in the United States has been arrested for calling 911 to avoid going on a date with a man she met on a dating app.

title: Julian Assange Walks Out Of US Court As "Free Man" After Plea Deal
content: WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange was freed by a court on the U.S. Pacific island territory of Saipan on Wednesday after pleading guilty to violating U.S. espionage law, in a deal that will see him return home to Australia.
summary: WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange was freed by a court on the U.S. Pacific island territory of Saipan on Wednesday after pleading guilty to violating U.S. espionage law, in a deal that will see him return home to Australia.

title: Nepalese Spiritual Leader 'Buddha Boy' Convicted Of Sexual Assault On Minor
content: A judge at the Sarlahi District Court found him guilty of sexually assaulting an underage girl and said sentencing would be on July 1.
summary: A judge at the Sarlahi District Court found him guilty of sexually assaulting an underage girl and said sentencing would be on July 1.

title: "Welcome Development": Australian PM On Julian Assange's US Plea Deal
content: Australia's prime minister hailed WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange's US plea deal hearing Wednesday as a "welcome development".
summary: Australia's prime minister hailed WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange's US plea deal hearing Wednesday as a "welcome development".

title: Princess Diana's Gowns, Shoes, Handbags To Go Up For Auction This Week
content: The biggest auction of Diana memorabilia since the late British princess sold dozens of outfits months before her death gets underway in California this week, featuring a midnight blue tulle dress and a flamenco-style lace-up number.
summary: The biggest auction of Diana memorabilia since the late British princess sold dozens of outfits months before her death gets underway in California this week, featuring a midnight blue tulle dress and a flamenco-style lace-up number.

title: Israel Set To Roll Out Plan To Replace Hamas Government In Gaza
content: Israel will "soon" roll out a plan to replace Hamas governance in northern Gaza, Israeli National Security Advisor Tzachi Hanegbi said on Tuesday.
summary: Israel will "soon" roll out a plan to replace Hamas governance in northern Gaza, Israeli National Security Advisor Tzachi Hanegbi said on Tuesday.

title: As Israel, Hezbollah Exchange Fire, US Warns Of "Terrible Consequences"
content: US Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin met his Israeli counterpart Yoav Gallant at the Pentagon on Tuesday, warning that a conflict between Israel and Hezbollah could spark a regional war and urging a diplomatic solution.
summary: US Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin met his Israeli counterpart Yoav Gallant at the Pentagon on Tuesday, warning that a conflict between Israel and Hezbollah could spark a regional war and urging a diplomatic solution.

title: Indians In Kenya Asked To Limit "Non-Essential" Movement Amid Protests
content: India has advised its citizens in Kenya to exercise utmost caution and restrict non-essential movement amid violent protests in the East African nation against the government's proposed tax hikes.
summary: India has advised its citizens in Kenya to exercise utmost caution and restrict non-essential movement amid violent protests in the East African nation against the government's proposed tax hikes.

title: WikiLeaks Says Julian Assange To Fly To Australia Within Hours
content: WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange will fly to the Australian capital Canberra within hours following a plea deal to set him free, the whistleblower website said Wednesday.
summary: WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange will fly to the Australian capital Canberra within hours following a plea deal to set him free, the whistleblower website said Wednesday.

title: US Voters Prefer Trump On Economy, Biden For Democracy: Survey
